titles.title: To amend titles 14 and 46, United States Code, to make technical corrections with respect to Coast Guard and shipping authorities, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.
Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. H. Rept. 115-1015.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 794.
